Texts: Goatman Peterson|||This is it! I! Goatman Peterson will become the best detective Supah Star!
Goatman Peterson|||I need to find the Right KILLER and WEAPON OF MURDER.
Goatman Peterson|||I will write every bit of evidence on my SUPAH STAR NOTEBOOK! Let's do this babe!
Jung|||Hmmm... What do you want?
Assattari|||So, you are the detective...Have you already checked the body?
Goatman Peterson|||If you mean yours... OH YEAH BABY! YOU'RE SMOKING HOT!
Assattari|||......................GET OUT OF HERE!!!
Lee|||He's dead! My best friend is dead! Leave me alone!
Goatman Peterson|||OHHH NO! Park! Ohhh Baby! You are DEAD!
Goatman Peterson|||Let's study your bodyyy baby!
Goatman Peterson|||Your body is so bruised! You look like a Panda!
Goatman Peterson|||Your seem to be stung by something on your chest.
Goatman Peterson|||And what is this? You are drenched. I guess it was a steamy fall.
Goatman Peterson|||I have examined the body Boy! Now... Thou shall tell me what happened here!
Jung|||Ugh...Fine... I was changing clothes in the dressroom when I heard a noice in the Hall...
Jung|||When I came out, I found Assattari, our producer, moving the body...
Jung|||She told me to take care of the body while she was going to call the Supah Unit.
Assattari|||What have you found detective? What happened to Park?!
Goatman Peterson|||Oh, my dear lady... I'm working on it!
Goatman Peterson|||I shall find whoever killed him and bring him to sweeeeet JUSTICE! Oh Yeah!
Goatman Peterson|||Now, I need you to tell me what happened here...
Assattari|||I was working on my office, Park came here to say goodbye and we he left the office
Assattari|||I heard a noise coming from the Hall. I went out and found him dead below the stairs.
Assattari|||I tried to move him to see if he was still alive but he wasn't... Damn!
Goatman Peterson|||I will find the killer, It's a SUPAAAH PROMISE!
Goatman Peterson|||Oh... Lee... Your best friend is dead... I cannot believe neither!
Lee|||I...I just can't believe it...
Goatman Peterson|||Don't worry bro, I'll find the killer! Now, tell me what happened...
Lee|||I was working on the studio with Park and Jung.
Lee|||When we finished, I went to the hair saloon to wait for Park. We where going to get a haircut
Goatman Peterson|||I see... Thank you you beautiful bro!
Goatman Peterson|||Oh my, my, my sweet baby Goat Savior... What do we have here?
Ruru|||Oh...oh.... hi?
Goatman Peterson|||And who might you be little one?
Ruru|||My...my name is Ruru
Goatman Peterson|||I see. So, Ruru, what are you doing here? Hidden away from everyone?
Ruru|||I was waiting to see my beautiful Park!
Goatman Peterson|||And how did you get in here?
Ruru|||I sneaked in looking for my Park when I was about to meet him,
Ruru|||I got nervous and hide here
Goatman Peterson|||I see
Goatman Peterson|||Ok, let's see what is in your body again...
Goatman Peterson|||Your body is so bruised! You look like a Panda!
Goatman Peterson|||Your seem to be stung by something on your chest.
Goatman Peterson|||And what is this? You are drenched. I guess it was a steamy fall.
Jung|||So...What have you found?
Assattari|||Tell me... Do you already know who murder Park?
Lee|||Please, tell me you found the killer!
Ruru|||Yes?
Jung|||He’s been acting weird and he seems distressed… No wonder his best mate just died.
Jung|||Though his constant interrogation and lack of trust is starting to get annoying.
Jung|||I don’t trust her. She was moving Park’s body when I found them.
Jung|||I don’t know exactly what happened but I’m pretty sure she has something to do with his death.
Jung|||Don’t buy into that cold pretty face…
Jung|||Crazy fan girl, very annoying and obsessive.
Jung|||I wonder what her life is like if she has nothing better to do than being a stalker.
Jung|||As annoying as he was, that dumb diva did not deserve to die.
Jung|||It would be a lie to say I’m not glad he’s out of my life.
Assattari|||He seems to be in shock and doesn’t trust anyone. I’m worried about him.
Assattari|||He may seem stoic at first sight but he’s short fused and emotional when he’s off guard.
Assattari|||That girl has been very annoying lately, sending weird letters to Park,
Assattari|||stalking him and leaving weird stuff outside the studio and even his home.
Assattari|||He used to tell me he was pretty creeped out on this matter.
Assattari|||He seemed tired when he came to say bye, and as he was about
Assattari|||to leave, he fell down the stairs. When I got to him, he was already dead,
Assattari|||I tried moving him but he wouldn’t budge… That’s when Jung came by…
Lee|||We have had our problems as any group in the industry.
Lee|||But lately, Jung has been very aggressive with both of us, particularly with Park…
Lee|||I don’t get what is his problem.
Lee|||Park and her seemed pretty close...
Lee|||There was some kind of special treatment between those two although I couldn’t confirm it…
Lee|||He would talk about her with me.
Lee|||A complete creep, her letters were disgusting.
Lee|||Park used to talk about how annoyed he was with her.
Lee|||I had to keep her from getting near him a couple of times.
Lee|||This… this wasn’t an accident! Someone here killed him, I know it!
Lee|||He helped me in my darkest moment. He wasn’t perfect but he had a big heart!
Lee|||…he …he didn’t deserve death. I will find the culprit with or without you.
Ruru|||That man is too close to my Park! He won’t have him, he’s just a snake that wants to prey on him!
Ruru|||He’s too quiet and sneaky, I don’t trust that guy!!
Ruru|||I don’t like him! He is scary and very mean.
Ruru|||The few times I have been close to him, he’s been cold and rude.
Ruru|||I fear he might shout or hit me out of nowhere.
Ruru|||Crazy fan girl, very annoying and obsessive.
Ruru|||I wonder what her life is like if she has nothing better to do than being a stalker.
Ruru|||As annoying as he was, that dumb diva did not deserve to die.
Ruru|||It would be a lie to say I’m not glad he’s out of my life.
